```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Load required packages
library(ggplot2)
```
### Refer to the PowerPoint slides for Visualization using R under week 5. 

### Your task is to write code to generate the plots in slides # 23, 24, and 49. 

### Please submit the Code as well as the corresponding plots of the code.

## #23



```{r mpg, echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data=mpg) + geom_point(aes(x=displ,y=hwy)) + facet_wrap(~class,nrow=3) +
  geom_line(aes(x=displ,y=hwy))
```

## #24

```{r  mpg-plot1, echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data=mpg) + geom_point(aes(x=displ,y=hwy)) +
  geom_line(aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))
```

## #49

```{r  diamonds, echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data = diamonds) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x=cut, y=price)) +
  facet_wrap(~color,nrow=2)
```
